snippet.title: Chakravyuh - Alpha Gameplay Demo at Godlike Difficulty
snippet.description:
Download now from Itch.io for Windows PC: https://terradarc.itch.io/chakravyuh

Survival Mode - Game Play Demo of Alpha Release at Godlike Difficulty !!!  Not for the faint of heart.

Fight back against waves of enemies across the planet as the face of earth's resistance against invading aliens in this Furiously Fast- Action Shoot 'em up. Equipped with an arsenal of vehicles, weapons and support equipment, survive as long as possible to set your most insane score in Survival Mode.


Soundtracks available at: http://teknoaxe.com

Copyright© 2018 Terradarc (OPC) Private Limited.
